required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of a Recombinant Coronavirus-Like Particle COVID-19 Vaccine in Adults
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Observer-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 2/3 Study to Assess the Safety, Efficacy, and Immunogenicity of a Recombinant Coronavirus-Like Particle COVID-19 Vaccine in Adults 18 Years of Age or Older

brief_summary.textblock:
This Phase 2/3 study is a multi-portion design to confirm that the chosen formulation and dosing regimen of CoVLP has an acceptable immunogenicity and safety profile.
The Phase 3 portion is an event-driven, randomized, observer blinded, placebo-controlled design that will evaluate the efficacy and safety of the CoVLP formulation compared to placebo.
Subjects will be followed for safety and immunogenicity for a period of 12 months after the last vaccination.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Percentage, intensity, and relationship to vaccination of immediate AEs

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 portion: Solicited local and systemic adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.description: Percentage, intensity, and relationship to vaccination of solicited local and systemic AEs
Percentage, intensity, and relationship of unsolicited AEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 portion: Solicited local and systemic AEs (populations 1 and 2)
secondary_outcome.description: Relative percentage of solicited local and systemic AEs following each vaccine administration between the healthy adults (Study Population #1) and the healthy elderly population (Study Population #2, each age strata);

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 portion: Solicited local and systemic AEs (populations 1, 2 and 3)
secondary_outcome.description: Relative percentage of solicited local and systemic AEs by intensity grades for seven days following each vaccine administration between the healthy adults (Study Population #1) and the healthy elderly adults (Study Population #2) combined and the adults with significant comorbidities (Study Population #3)

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 portion: Serious adverse events (SAEs), medically attended adverse events (MAAEs), adverse events (AEs) leading to withdrawal, adverse event of special interest (AESI) (including vaccine-enhanced disease) and deaths

arm_group.description: 3.75 µg of CoVLP adjuvanted vaccine with AS03 adjuvant (0.5 mL)

intervention.description: Subjects will receive two doses of placebo given 21 days apart into the deltoid region of the alternating arm (each arm will be injected once)
Subjects will receive two doses of 3.75 µg of CoVLP adjuvanted with AS03 adjuvant given 21 days apart into the deltoid region of the alternating arm (each arm will be injected once)
